author: michele.mostarda
msg: This commit fixes the issue #57, improving the EntityBasedMicroformatExtractor with the addition of the resetExtractor() method. improved AbstractMicroformatTestCase. The resolution of such issue enlighted the presence of another bug in HCardExtractor test, unable to recognize an organition within img alt text. The second bug has fixed in this same commit.

author: michele.mostarda
msg: Fixed NPE related to missing content type. Prevented URL encoding of URL query operators, &, =. It seems that old Perl servers don't deal with proper URL decoding.
